credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Catharine Oglesby
title: Aesop's Fable: The Fox and the Crow
description: Greek revival style. Central motif is a framed picture of Aesop's fable "The Fox and the Crow" on black background. Surrounded by medallions of fruits and flowers, trailing grape vines, Greek palmettes, birds, and scrolls. Printed in 9 colors: orange, brown, black, lavender and blue on an off-white satin ground.
name: Sidewall
